metadata.name: Bahamut
metadata.description:
The dragon King, the god of phantom beast.

Can only be summoned upon by the one who defeats him.

Every presence brings disaster with "Mega Flare". A great breath of energy concentrated into a beam and fired to opposition.

✽❀✿❃✤

Original Image size: 500 x 800 pixels
Upscale size: 2,000 x 3,200 pixels
File format: png
